news.title: CVPR Tutorial: Identifying Structure in Data
news.description: Successfully presented our tutorial on dimensionality reduction, clustering, and data exploration techniques at CVPR 2024.

news.title: Junior Research Group Leadership
news.description: Started leading the Computer Vision in Medicine research group at University Medicine Essen.

news.title: PhD Completed with Summa Cum Laude
news.description: Successfully defended PhD thesis on automatic generation of medical reports in low supervision scenarios.

news.title: KIT Doctoral Award
news.description: Received the prestigious KIT Doctoral Award for outstanding dissertation research.
